html:
Hotel Stay Receipt

{{ doc.name }}

Guest:{{ doc.guest or '' }}
Room:{{ doc.room or '' }} ({{ doc.room_type or '' }})
Check-in:{{ frappe.format_value(doc.actual_check_in or doc.expected_check_in, {"fieldtype": "Datetime"}) }}
Check-out:{{ frappe.format_value(doc.actual_check_out or doc.expected_check_out, {"fieldtype": "Datetime"}) }}
Nights:{{ doc.nights or 0 }}
Room Rate:{{ frappe.format_value(doc.room_rate, {"fieldtype": "Currency"}) }}
{% if doc.additional_services %}

Additional Services

{% for s in doc.additional_services %} {% endfor %}
ServiceQtyRateAmount
{{ s.service_type or '' }} {{ s.quantity or 0 }} {{ frappe.format_value(s.rate, {"fieldtype": "Currency"}) }} {{ frappe.format_value(s.amount, {"fieldtype": "Currency"}) }}
{% endif %}
Total: {{ frappe.format_value(doc.total_amount, {"fieldtype": "Currency"}) }}

Thank you for staying with us!
name: Hotel Stay Receipt
